citations.narrative:
A shelter in the muntjac pen near the gift shop is in a state of disrepair. There is a hole in the wooden threshold at the
entrance of the shelter approximately 4" x 2". A corner of metal edging is bent away from the wall, exposing sharp metal
edges and two screws. There are several areas of peeling paint outside of the enclosure. Two old, rotten wood ceiling
boards have large holes and the wood is caving into the shelter. Sharp edges, holes in the floor, unstable ceilings, and
paint can cause injury or harm to the animals. Correct by January 31, 2023 by ensuring indoor and outdoor housing
facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. The facility took measures
to correct the issue during the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Lauren Murphy, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
A shelter in the muntjac pen near the gift shop is in a state of disrepair. There is a hole in the wooden threshold at the 
entrance of the shelter approximately 4" x 2". A corner of metal edging is bent away from the wall, exposing sharp metal 
edges and two screws. There are several areas of peeling paint outside of the enclosure. Two old, rotten wood ceiling 
boards have large holes and the wood is caving into the shelter. Sharp edges, holes in the floor, unstable ceilings, and 
paint can cause injury or harm to the animals. Correct by January 31, 2023 by ensuring indoor and outdoor housing 
facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. The facility took measures 
to correct the issue during the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Lauren Murphy, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
